conbody.p: When a problem occurs, the system shows a dialog box to prompt the user.

li.p: This type of prompt message is to provide additional information. Click OK to go.
It informs the user to decide whether to perform the next step of operation.
Click Yes to continue the operation.
Click No to cancel the operation.
It informs the user of some warning information. Click OK according to the prompts or to take other corresponding actions.

The error message prompt box informs the user of some additional information. The prompt may appear at the system status bar or in the system information at the bottom left corner of the page. Click OK according to the prompts or take corresponding actions.
